data.author: Joe Rogan
data.quote: There's a direct correlation between positive energy and positive results in the physical form.

data.author: Joe Rogan
data.quote: If you ever start taking things too seriously, just remember that we are talking monkeys on an organic spaceship flying through the universe.

data.author: Joe Rogan
data.quote: Life is strange. You keep moving and keep moving. Before you know it, you look back and think, 'What was that?'.

data.author: Joe Rogan
data.quote: I realized a long time ago that instead of being jealous you can be inspired and appreciative. It carries more energy to you. That can be an awesome and motivating force that can improve your life if you choose to be inspired and not jealous. One has no benefit whatsoever, the other is an incredible resource for creating momentum and improvement.

data.author: Joe Rogan
data.quote: Be cool to people. Be nice to as many people as you can. Smile to as many people as you can, and have them smile back at you.

data.author: Joe Rogan
data.quote: To really appreciate life you got to know you're going to die.

data.author: Joe Rogan
data.quote: Live your life like you're the hero in your own movie.

data.author: Joe Rogan
data.quote: One of the most fascinating lessons I've absorbed about life is that the struggle is good.

data.author: Joe Rogan
data.quote: The time you spend hating on someone robs you of your own time. You are literally hating on yourself and you don't even realize it.

data.author: Joe Rogan
data.quote: There's a never-ending ocean of techniques out there.

data.author: Joe Rogan
data.quote: Haters are all failures. It's 100% across the board. No one who is truly brilliant at anything is a hater.

data.author: Winston S. Churchill
data.quote: Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts

data.author: Herman Melville
data.quote: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.

data.author: Colin R. Davis
data.quote: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.

data.author: Henry David Thoreau
data.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.

data.author: Chris Grosser
data.quote: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.

data.author: John D. Rockefeller
data.quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.

data.author: Thomas Jefferson
data.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have

data.author: Albert Einstein
data.quote: Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value.

data.author: Winston Churchill
data.quote: Never give in except to convictions of honor and good sense
